name: 2018 Pokemon Japanese SM Promo Munch A Retrospective 286 Psyduck PSA 9 Mint (0xa682...0aa1)
description: RareMint Pokemon Genesis Mystery Pack (0xa68267c79d2eaf2d70ddcb7d017513246bffa8dbdd369d6bf7b13fd373c30aa1) derived from the human readeable fingerprint of the physical item - which will be revealed at the same time as the NFT itself - using the Keccak256 cryptographic function. This unique identifier serves as a verifiable *Proof of Integrity* to certify that the corresponding physical asset is irrevocably associated to this NFT and vice-versa.
